subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
We are operating a funding program that offers collateral-free loans and project funding to individuals, organizations, and private establishments.
If you are seeking funding for a specific shovel-ready project, you will be funded at 1.5% principal annual interest.
If you would like to collaborate with us as a middleman/facilitator, you will earn 2% of the total project cost or loan as your commission for every successful loan or project funding deal facilitated by you. Our loan is special and we would clarify you with more details, Please get in touch if this is of interest to you for further details.
Regards,
CFO

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It sounds like an interesting opportunity. I'm curious to know more about your funding program. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what types of projects do you typically fund? And how does the process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Good News Respond
body:
Your message has been received, sorry for my late response. Details will be
given to you as soon as you respond back. My name is MO Jack Jamal, I'm the
CFO of our company and our head office is in Saudi Arabia where we have
branches in Spain, Qatar, Netherlands, Kuwait, Barren, Turkey and Mexico,
we have a team of diplomatic financial consultants that can pay in
Indonesia and Dubai. Our loan goes from 10 million minimum to 1.5 billion
maximum, we can also increase our loan if you are doing well. There must be
a physical meeting in one of our offices of your choice where you will do
the complete biometrics and the documentation order before we proceed to
the bank for the disbursement of your loan funds to you. If your loan is
more than 500 million, we disburse 40% to you immediately after the
documentation has been obtained and our team will have to visit your site
to see your project which after a week the other 60% will be disbursed to
you without wasting time after the successful inspection.

I hope you understand, our loan is 100% legitimate and the only collateral
required from you if you are interested is your full address, valid
identification (passport or driver's license), Whatsapp telephone number
and the name you wish to have on the MOU. All of this information has to be
completed before the MOU will be given to you, you will be happy using our
loan because no one can stress or disturb you and our loan is peaceful,
authentic and 100% verifiable. Get back to me immediately if you are
interested. I await your urgent response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear about the extensive reach of your company, with branches in so many countries. I'm intrigued by the loan options you've mentioned.

Could you please elaborate more on the process of obtaining a loan? What does the biometrics and order process involve? Also, could you explain what an MOU is?

I'm also curious about the site visit. What exactly does your team look for during this visit?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the extensive reach of your company, with branches in so many diverse locations. I'm also intrigued by the loan amounts you mentioned, ranging from millions to billions. That's quite a range!

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned that there must be a physical meeting at one of your offices - could you please elaborate on what this meeting would entail? Also, could you provide more information about the biometrics and order process?

Furthermore, I'm curious about the site visit by your team for loans exceeding a certain amount. What exactly does this visit involve? And how is it determined whether or not my project is doing well?

Lastly, regarding the collateral required - full address, valid passport or driver's license Whatsapp telephone number and name for the MOU - could you explain why these specific pieces of information are necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the extensive reach of your company, with branches in so many diverse locations. I'm also intrigued by the loan amounts you mentioned, ranging from millions to billions. That's quite a range!

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned something about a physical meeting at one of your offices. Could you please elaborate on what this meeting would entail? Also, could you explain more about the biometrics and order process?

Furthermore, I'm curious about the disbursement process for loans exceeding million. You mentioned that your team would visit my site to see my project - what exactly are they looking for during this visit?

Lastly, regarding the collateral required - full address, valid passport or driver's license Whatsapp telephone number and name for the MOU - could you clarify what an MOU is and why these specific pieces of information are needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the operations of your company and the loan services you offer. I'm intrigued by the fact that your loans range from millions to billions, that's quite a wide range!

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned something about a physical meeting in one of your offices. Could you please elaborate more on what this meeting would entail? Also, could you explain more about the biometrics and order process?

You also mentioned something about a team visiting my site if my loan is more than million. What exactly will they be looking for during this visit?

Lastly, could you provide more details about the MOU? What does it include and why is it necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear about the global presence of your company and the financial services you offer. I'm intrigued by the loan options, especially the fact that it ranges from million to billion.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please elaborate on what you mean by 'complete biometrics'? Also, could you explain more about the process after obtaining the MOU? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: READ THE DETAILS AND RESPOND
body:
*READ THE THREE MAILS CAREFULLY, COMPLETE INFORMATION WILL BE ON THE MOU*



Hello,

There would be an MOU that guides these loans, which would be sent to you.
You are to review, sign and return back to our managing director Dr. John
Saheed on his official email address (johnsaheed@financemanagment.com).
Please kindly indicate the exact amount you are requesting for the loan.
Firstly, these loans require a meeting in any of our offices which must
hold for further discussion and signing of the loan documentation. Also,
note that the process is not strictly communicated by email, there must be
a physical meeting which would take place in any of our offices after which
funds would be disbursed to you. Without you coming for the physical
meeting, it will cost you because we would  recommend you to an attorney
who will stand for you, which is expensive. Our billionaire chairman do not
like it that way because of what is going on the internet and what is going
on in the world today, so no one will feel cheated which is why any of our
clients needs to appear for the physical meeting, thumb prints,
documentation signing and proceed together  to the bank for disbursement of
your loan funds to you which will happen same day if you arrive early. Be
good and smile because our billionaire chairman is globally connected with
so many big banks and corresponding banks in the world, in which your loan
funds can be released once, bank draft or bit by bit depending on how you
want it released to you. The most important thing is the documentation and
the release is authentic and confirmable.

Your information is being needed completely, because it stands as your
collateral. Please reconfirm

- Full Name
- Full address
- Loan Amount Needed
- Personal\ WhatsApp telephone Number
- Attach any copy of your valid identification (Passport or Driver's
license)

As we said before, we are connected to various big banks all over the world
and the corresponding bank is perfect, so there would never be any delay in
payments. Our networking is wonderful and can never be compared with the
rest of mind. I'm in charge of communication to inform our client to help
them understand our terms and guidelines for surrendering this loan before
directing it to our managing director in charge. All our terms are simple,
and collateral is straightforward which involves your full name, full
address, personal telephone number, and also the number you can reach on
Whatsapp for the confidentiality guiding this loan. Our loan is 100% legit,
which you would witness yourself in our various offices and bank
transactions so you have  nothing to worry about. We can transfer money
anywhere in the world but if the loan is above $50 million would be split
in batches. Again, our office can offer loans of 10 million (minimum) to 1
billion (maximum).

Communicating on the phone would commence as soon as the MOU has been
signed and sent back, our managing director Dr. John Saheed will
communicate with you with his official email address and telephone number.
The information would be given to you as soon as the MOU is signed and
returned and you indicate the country you can travel to for the physical
meeting. We prefer meeting with our clients so they can witness the process
of the loan, signing the documents themselves, all our clients are very
happy because we do not waste any of their time upon arrival. It takes a
day process involving meetings in the morning at the office and at noon for
the bank release payments. Our clients can come in early and go back the
next day.

If you understand very well, then the next step is MOU. Please let me know
if you need any clarification. In our previous emails, be informed that we
have our offices in Dubai, Netherland, London, Spain, Indonesia, Kuwait,
Barren, Qatar or Turkey at which disbursement would be made. You are free
to ask questions where you do not understand. Finally, if you are not
buoyant enough or capable of this loan you are free to refer someone who is
willing and capable, our loan remains the best with a 15 years grace and
you would manage it for 2years grace before the loan starts counting at
1.5% Annual interest with the rest of mind. Get back to me with the details
needed, just go ahead and reconfirm please and also attach your
investment\project plan and whatsapp number where you can be reached and
attach any of your valid identification. All our reconfirmation is to
ensure your details are correct and confirmed. I await your quick response.


Kind regards,
CFO


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I really want to work with you and for you to receive this loan and our
loan remains one of the best in the world today because we give 15 years
and 1.5% interest rate when you manage the funds for the loan for 2years.
We are happy people because my billionaire chairman is progressive who
helps people a lot who is an oil magnet and he owns a football club, you
have nothing to lose as the loan would be given to you to manage before you
start paying back the 1.5% interest. Your collateral is your address, a
valid identification and your personal telephone number and also the name
you wish to be in the MOU, either your personal or your company name. We
give out big loans. Remember, from 10 million to 1 billion, please indicate
the amount you want and also attach your valid identification and where you
can be reached on whatsapp or call. Reconfirm your full details by
responding to this mail with the full details needed so we can forward it
immediately to our managing director Dr. John Saheed for your MOU to be
ready next tomorrow. Follow my instructions and reconfirm the details  if
you are interested in this loan and you will thank me later. Bank to bank
transfer without you appearing in any of our offices will cost you money
upfront for clearance, that is why we made it mandatory for our client to
visit any of our offices for a physical meeting and documentation, signing
and thumb prints.

 I would like to address a few points before finalizing the preparation and
delivery of the MOU. It would greatly help our process if you could provide
me with more information regarding your loan request. Also, understanding
the intended purpose for the funds. It would be valuable for the content of
the MOU. Our networking remains the best and we are connected all over the
world with some big banks and we can give loans to any country in the
world. Our loan offer is the best (lowest) and unbelievable in the world
today. AFTER THE BOARD MEETING TODAY, OUR OFFER GOES FROM 10 MILLION
(MINIMUM) TO 1.5 billion (MAXIMUM) LIMIT. If there are any aspects of this
matter that seem unclear, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm readily
available to furnish you with any necessary details to ensure complete
understanding. The process of releasing these funds is designed to be
straightforward and transparent.

To proceed, I kindly request again to confirm

- Full name
- A valid address that you would prefer to have included in the MOU.
- Loan amount needed
- Personal telephone number and also, attach any of your valid
identification

Once the MOU is reviewed, don't waste time, sign and return. I'll be able
to provide you with the contact information of our Managing Director.
Remember, there would be a physical meeting in any of our offices to sign
and release your funds to you. Our MD would guide you through the
subsequent steps and offer further insights into this loan initiative. Our
commitment remains centered on providing you with exceptional service.

Best Regards,
CFO



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Thank you for your feedback and also sorry for the late reply. This loan
requires your home/office address, personal telephone/office numbers, full
name and attached any of your valid identification, which is the
collateral. As previously stated, we are operating a funding programme that
is providing entrepreneurs and individuals with quick, collateral-free
funding for economically viable projects and/or businesses of all sizes,
including startup projects and existing businesses.

Please note the following essentials:
-  Our funding is from a trust fund belonging to a consortium of
high-net-worth angel investors, our chairman is from Saudi Arabia who owns
a football club, a philanthropist and has an oil well who desires to invest
through entrepreneurial individuals and economically viable projects
without revealing identities.
- We do not enter into joint ventures or take equity ownership in the
projects we fund.
-  We give loan to economically viable projects at 1.5% principal annual
interest and strictly by loan
-  Our funding is un-restrictive to locations and project types
- Our loan ranges from USD$10M (minimum) to USD$1.5B (maximum)
- Our funding is 15 years, with a 2 year's grace period and the option of
renewing for an equal or half term.
- Our key requirements for the funding of an economically viable project
are an EXECUTED PROJECT FUNDING DEED OF AGREEMENT and a NOTARIZED PERSONAL
UNDERTAKING of the Project Owner for the repayment of our funds and the
performance of his contractual obligations under the PROJECT FUNDING DEED
OF AGREEMENT.
-  Following the execution of our project funding DOA by the
borrower/project owner and his issuance of a notarised personal undertaking
for the repayment of our funds and performance of his contractual
obligations under the DOA, the loan will be disbursed within the next three
(3) official days via SWIFT credit or via bank to bank  transfer. However,
depending on the size of the funding, the project owner/borrower may be
required to attend a meeting in any of our offices at which disbursement
will be made via our angel investors’ bank.. This is payable by the
borrower/project owner prior to the disbursement of funds.
- The borrower/project owner is entitled to repay the loan including
accumulated return in one lump sum at any time, including before the end of
the term of the loan. A prepayment penalty shall not be due. Proof of Fund
is available and will be provided at an advanced stage of a loan/project
funding transaction that we deem real and/or serious.

The steps precedent to our loan are as follows:

STEP 1. We assess the borrower's project application/documentation in order
to determine the viability and soundness of his project (This may take up
to 24hrs)

STEP 2.  Presentation of our draft Funding Deed of Agreement as well as our
draft borrower's/project owner's Personal Undertaking for repayment of our
loan and performance of contractual obligations under the loan/funding DOA.
(This will be presented to the borrower/project owner as a formal
expression of our approval for the loan

STEP 3. The borrower/project owner signs the Funding DOA and returns it
with his notarized Personal Undertaking.

STEP 4. Disbursement of funds as outlined above.

Middleman/facilitator’s commission

If you are participating as a middleman, you will earn 2% of the total
project cost or loan amount as your commission for every successful loan or
project funding deal facilitated by you. Get back to me as soon as
possible. I have more interesting details to give you that guide the loan,
please read carefully and respond back so I can feed you more understanding
information.

Sincerely,
CFO

subject: Re: Good News Respond
body:
Hello MO Jack Jamal,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear about the extensive reach of your company, with branches in so many diverse locations. I'm intrigued by the loan options you've mentioned, especially the possibility of increasing the loan if things are going well.

I do have a few questions though. Could you please elaborate on what you mean by 'complete biometrics and the order'? Also, could you clarify what 'the successful' refers to in your message?

You mentioned that a physical meeting is required at one of your offices. Given the current global situation with COVID-19, are there any alternative arrangements available? 

Lastly, I'm curious about the site visit by your team for loans more than million. What exactly does this entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: READ THE DETAILS AND RESPOND
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must say, it's quite a lot to take in at once. However, I'm intrigued by the opportunity and would like to learn more about it.

You mentioned an MOU that needs to be reviewed and signed. Could you please elaborate on what this MOU entails? Also, could you provide more information about the physical meeting? Where are your offices located?

I'm also curious about the loan amounts. You mentioned that loans range from USD million minimum to USD billion maximum. That's quite a wide range! How do you determine the exact amount to lend?

Lastly, could you explain more about the repayment terms? You mentioned a year's grace period and an annual interest rate. What happens after the grace period ends?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: GOOD NEWS
body:
Notice from our head office to our client, our office in Spain and Qatar
is available now and our team of bankers are available to move out any
amount of funds. Let me know when you can travel for a meeting and mention
the country you can travel to, so that you can be booked in for a meeting
and release of your loan funds. Our MOU agreement explains everything which
you are to provide the information below.

i. Full address
ii. Valid identification (driver's license or passport)
iii. Whatsapp telephone number
iv. Loan amount needed
v. The name you wish to be on the MOU

Send me the full details and answer my question above where you can travel
to and when. I need the details and the answer so I can forward it to our
managing director Dr. John Saheed. Remember tah our loan gos from 1o
million minimum to 1.5 billion maximum. I await your urgent response
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's great to hear that your offices in Spain and Qatar are now available. I'm sure this is a big step forward for your organization.

I'm curious about the process of booking meetings and releasing loan funds. Could you tell me more about how this works? Also, could you provide some more details about the MOU agreement?

As for traveling, I am currently unable to travel due to personal reasons. Is it possible to conduct these meetings virtually instead?

Regarding the details you've asked for, I would like to understand better why they are needed before providing them. Could you explain their purpose in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS
body:
If you can not travel, you are free to send somebody unless you are ready
to spend money upfront and our managing director Dr. John Saheed will get a
lawyer to stand on your behalf, if you can send somebody or if you can't
come. It is a compulsory thing to be available for the meeting that is why
our billionaire chairman made it compulsory so no one will feel cheated.
There must be a physical meeting for the complete documentation, thumb
prints, signing of the loan documents and handing over of the original
documentation and also proceed to the bank for the final documentation and
the release of your loan funds to you immediately. Your information stands
as your collateral, your full address, valid identification driver's
license or passport, loan amount you want and also the name you wish to be
on the MOU and I will forward it to our managing director Dr. John Saheed
for him to approve your MOU. Our Mou explains everything about our loan and
before the MOU will be sent to you, your full details have to be complete.
Go ahead and send me your complete information for us to proceed further. I
await your urgent response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate the effort you've put into this. However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of the process. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, could you explain more about the physical meeting? Is it possible to conduct this meeting virtually due to current travel restrictions? 

Secondly, regarding the MOU, could you provide more details on what it entails? What kind of information does it contain and why is it necessary for my full details to be complete before sending it?

Lastly, I'm not quite sure about the role of Dr. John Saheed in this process. Could you elaborate on his responsibilities and how he will assist me throughout this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: READ AND RESPOND IMMEDIATELY
body:
Dr. John Saheed is our managing director in charge of documentation and
funds release. The meeting in our office is compulsory for any of our
clients to be in one of our offices physically to sign all the
documentation, thumb prints and also proceed to the bank for the final
endorsementment and onward transfer. You know there are a lot of crazy
things going on the internet and the world today. We have a wonderful
arrangement that is why our billionaire chairman made it compulsory for any
of our clients to visit one of our offices, so the person will see and
witness the authenticity of the loan and also go back with the original
documentation. Our loan is different and 100% legitimate, stress free and
peaceful because the meeting will take only one day. After 2 hours in our
office and 2 hours in the bank, the person can confirm the return ticket
and go back in the night the same day or the next day. Send me your full
details and the name you wish to be on the MOU, full address, any of your
valid identification (driver's license or passport), loan amount you need,
Whatsapp telephone number and also indicate the country of our office that
you can travel to in the Netherlands, Spain or Qatar. This is where we have
enough money for disbursement. As soon as I get your full information, I
will forward  it to our managing director Dr. John Saheed for him to
approve and get your MOU ready and also contact you on Whatsapp by
tomorrow, Wednesday. The good thing about our loan, as soon as the
disbursement is complete, our bank will contact your bank so you have
nothing to worry about. If you are willing and interested in our loan,
kindly send me your full details as requested so I can forward it to our
managing director immediately, no time to waste. Bear in mind, our loan
ranges from 10 million minimum to 1.5 billion. all our offices are
available depending on the amount you want. Our MOU explains every detail
of our loan and you will read and understand, sign and return back. Get
back to me if you are interested, I await your urgent response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: READ AND RESPOND IMMEDIATELY
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of your loan system. I must say, it sounds very thorough and secure.

I'm curious though, could you tell me more about this MOU? What exactly does it entail? And how does it protect both parties involved in the loan agreement?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a meeting at one of your offices being compulsory. Could you elaborate on why this is necessary? Is there an option for a virtual meeting considering the current global situation?

Lastly, could you provide more information about Dr. John Saheed? His role seems quite important in this process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Steven

can be reached on whatsapp or call. Reconfirm your full details by
responding to this mail with the full details needed so we can forward it
immediately to our managing director Dr. John Saheed for your MOU to be
ready next tomorrow. Follow my instructions and reconfirm the details  if
you are interested in this loan and you will thank me later. Bank to bank
transfer without you appearing in any of our offices will cost you money
upfront for clearance, that is why we made it mandatory for our client to
visit any of our offices for a physical meeting and documentation, signing
and thumb prints.

 I would like to address a few points before finalizing the preparation and
delivery of the MOU. It would greatly help our process if you could provide
me with more information regarding your loan request. Also, understanding
the intended purpose for the funds. It would be valuable for the content of
the MOU. Our networking remains the best and we are connected all over the
world with some big banks and we can give loans to any country in the
world. Our loan offer is the best (lowest) and unbelievable in the world
today. AFTER THE BOARD MEETING TODAY, OUR OFFER GOES FROM 10 MILLION
(MINIMUM) TO 1 billion (MAXIMUM) LIMIT. If there are any aspects of this
matter that seem unclear, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm readily
available to furnish you with any necessary details to ensure complete
understanding. The process of releasing these funds is designed to be
straightforward and transparent.

To proceed, I kindly request again to confirm

- Full name
- A valid address that you would prefer to have included in the MOU.
- Loan amount needed
- Personal telephone number and also, attach any of your valid
identification

Once the MOU is reviewed, don't waste time, sign and return. I'll be able
to provide you with the contact information of our Managing Director.
Remember, there would be a physical meeting in any of our offices to sign
and release your funds to you. Our MD would guide you through the
subsequent steps and offer further insights into this loan initiative. Our
commitment remains centered on providing you with exceptional service.

Best Regards,
CFO



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Thank you for your feedback and also sorry for the late reply. This loan
requires your home/office address, personal telephone/office numbers, full
name and attached any of your valid identification, which is the
collateral. As previously stated, we are operating a funding programme that
is providing entrepreneurs and individuals with quick, collateral-free
funding for economically viable projects and/or businesses of all sizes,
including startup projects and existing businesses.

Please note the following essentials:
-  Our funding is from a trust fund belonging to a consortium of
high-net-worth angel investors, our chairman is from Saudi Arabia who owns
a football club, a philanthropist and has an oil well who desires to invest
through entrepreneurial individuals and economically viable projects
without revealing identities.
- We do not enter into joint ventures or take equity ownership in the
projects we fund.
-  We give loan to economically viable projects at 1.5% principal annual
interest and strictly by loan
-  Our funding is un-restrictive to locations and project types
- Our loan ranges from USD$10M (minimum) to USD$1B (maximum)
- Our funding is 15 years, with a 2 year's grace period and the option of
renewing for an equal or half term.
- Our key requirements for the funding of an economically viable project
are an EXECUTED PROJECT FUNDING DEED OF AGREEMENT and a NOTARIZED PERSONAL
UNDERTAKING of the Project Owner for the repayment of our funds and the
performance of his contractual obligations under the PROJECT FUNDING DEED
OF AGREEMENT.
-  Following the execution of our project funding DOA by the
borrower/project owner and his issuance of a notarised personal undertaking
for the repayment of our funds and performance of his contractual
obligations under the DOA, the loan will be disbursed within the next three
(3) official days via SWIFT credit or via bank to bank  transfer. However,
depending on the size of the funding, the project owner/borrower may be
required to attend a meeting in any of our offices at which disbursement
will be made via our angel investors’ bank.. This is payable by the
borrower/project owner prior to the disbursement of funds.
- The borrower/project owner is entitled to repay the loan including
accumulated return in one lump sum at any time, including before the end of
the term of the loan. A prepayment penalty shall not be due. Proof of Fund
is available and will be provided at an advanced stage of a loan/project
funding transaction that we deem real and/or serious.

The steps precedent to our loan are as follows:

STEP 1. We assess the borrower's project application/documentation in order
to determine the viability and soundness of his project (This may take up
to 24hrs)

STEP 2.  Presentation of our draft Funding Deed of Agreement as well as our
draft borrower's/project owner's Personal Undertaking for repayment of our
loan and performance of contractual obligations under the loan/funding DOA.
(This will be presented to the borrower/project owner as a formal
expression of our approval for the loan

STEP 3. The borrower/project owner signs the Funding DOA and returns it
with his notarized Personal Undertaking.

STEP 4. Disbursement of funds as outlined above.

Middleman/facilitator’s commission

If you are participating as a middleman, you will earn 5% of the total
project cost or loan amount as your commission for every successful loan or
project funding deal facilitated by you. Get back to me as soon as
possible. I have more interesting details to give you that guide the loan,
please read carefully and respond back so I can feed you more understanding
information.

Sincerely,
CFO

subject: Re: READ AND RESPOND IMMEDIATELY
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the loan process. It's quite comprehensive and I appreciate the time you took to explain everything. 

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned that there would be an MOU to guide these loans. Could you please elaborate more on what this MOU entails? 

Also, I'm curious about the physical meeting that must take place in one of your offices. Is it possible to conduct this meeting virtually given the current global situation with COVID-19?

Lastly, could you provide more information about the attorney who will stand for me? What exactly is their role and why is it expensive?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: READ AND RESPOND IMMEDIATELY
body:
Hello Steven,

Our loan is beautiful because of your full details, full address, valid
identification, loan amount you need, whatsapp telephone number and the
name you wish to be on the MOU. Every detail about our loan is on the MOU
which will be sent to you to read, sign and return back which our managing
director Dr. John Saheed will give you the contact details of the office
you choose to travel to. Your complete details are needed because it stands
as your collateral. It is not possible for a virtual meeting because there
will be signing, thumb prints, handing over of the original documentation
and the release of your loan funds. Our billionaire chairman made it
mandatory for any of our clients interested in the loan to come down to any
of our offices for the complete biometrics and documentation order in which
you will witness everything yourself. Go ahead and send me your complete
details for us to proceed further. I await your urgent response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: TODAY'S NEWS
body:
I hope you are good. I have given you enough details and the rest of the
information is in the MOU details. Our MOU carries full details about our
loan and I do not know how to explain it all till you read the terms and
conditions. Our loan is very simple, understanding and straightforward.
Make up your mind and send me the details. If I didn't get your details in
full I will know that you are not interested. After Monday, your loan
application will be cancelled and you will not be communicated again. You
have the chance now to forward your complete details because after Monday,
your loan will be cancelled. That is today's news, it is your choice to get
back to me so I can forward your details to our managing director to
contact you on Whatsapp. I await your urgent response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: GOOD NEWS FOR US
body:
My name is Mo Jack Jamal, and I am in charge of communication and making
sure all our clients understand our loan procedures. Our managing director
Dr. John Saheed is in charge of the MOU and finance controller. I have
discussed with our managing director and he has read your letter and the
terms and conditions which are okay with us, we can work with the terms and
everything is good on our own side. In Spain, we have over 17.6 billion
which is not a problem, any loan above 300 million, we can release 40%
after the loan documentation has been obtained and after a week, our team
would come over to supervise the investment of the loan and after
confirmation, the rest 60% will be released the following week. The meeting
will take place in one of our offices in the Netherlands, Spain, Turkey,
Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Dubai, Mexico or Indonesia. Our billionaire chairman
made in compulsory for any of our client interested in our loan must come
down to any of our offices for the complete biometrics, thumb prints,
signing of the original documentation, handing over of the documentation in
our office and proceed to the bank for the disbursement of the loan funds
immediately. 2 hours in our office and 2 hours inside the bank for the
final verification and onward transfer. The next step is the MOU to be
given to read and understand, sign and return the back. Our MOU explains
every detail of our loan and agreement guiding the transaction, our loan is
beautiful because your information stands as collateral which is Full name,
valid identification, Whatsapp telephone number, Loan amount needed, the
name you wish to be on the MOU and the office of choice you can travel to.
Remember, we can give from 10 million minimum to 1.5 billion maximum at
1.5% interest per annum for a period of 20 years. The periodicity of the
interest payment and the date of repayment of the loan shall be agreed upon
in a separate loan agreement physically in our office. Get back to me with
the complete information: full name, valid identification (passport or
driver's license), Whatsapp telephone number, loan amount needed, the name
you wish to be on the MOU and the country you can travel to and I will
forward it to our managing director Dr. John Saheed for him to approve and
prepare the MOU for you to read and understand. I await your urgent
response.
Regards,
*CFO*

is genuine. Send me your whatsapp telephone number so he can contact you on

approved. Remember physical meeting is compulsory for you to see and
witness that your loan is genuine, Waiting to hear from you for your
whatsapp contact number. Thanks for your understanding.

subject: MONDAY NEWS
body:
I hope you have a great weekend. I have been sending you mails everyday
but you are not responding positively. Our billionaire chairman has made a
stamp for all pending transactions that are not forthcoming should be
cancelled after tomorrow 5th, March. If you are interested, respond to me.
His words stand, that means if you are interested you have today to show
that you are ready for a loan, mention the amount needed and your whatsapp
telephone number and I will forward it to our managing director Dr. John
Saheed immediately. The good news about it is that we can partner with you,
but remember there must be a physical meeting in one of our offices in the
Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Mexico, Singapore, Qatar, Dubai or Indonesia
for the complete documentation, signing and handing over of the original
documentation. Get back to me immediately, I await your response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: MONDAY NEWS
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message and I hope you're having a great weekend too! It's interesting to hear about the opportunity of a loan. Could you please provide more details about it? What are the terms and conditions? And what would be the interest rate?

Also, could you tell me more about this physical meeting? What exactly will happen during this meeting? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: MONDAY NEWS
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message and I hope you're having a great weekend too! It's interesting to hear about the opportunity you're presenting. Could you please provide more details about this loan? What are the terms and conditions? And what is the interest rate?

Also, could you tell me more about these physical meetings? How often would they occur and what would be discussed during them?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Last Opportunity
body:
I didn't receive your message this morning. The loan will be cancelled
by tomorrow being 6th Wednesday, just to give you a soft reminder. This is
the notice this morning, no more going forth and backward, the loan
application will be terminated by tomorrow. You have a chance now to
respond with your full details if you still want to proceed with the loan.
Good luck and I am waiting for your response.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: Last Opportunity
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the reminder about the loan cancellation. However, I'm a bit confused about some details. Could you please clarify what exactly this loan is for? And why is it being cancelled?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: GOOD NEWS TODAY
body:
We have a beautiful arrangement in India, our diplomatic financial
consultant has agreed to come over to India to pay you your loan without
you traveling anywhere. You are very lucky because the arrangement will
start immediately as soon as I hear from you, then I'd give you further
details if you are interested. Send me your whatsapp telephone number so
our managing director Dr. John Saheed will contact you immediately for your
MOU.

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS TODAY
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing opportunity! I'm really lucky indeed. I'd love to hear more about this process. Could you please explain how it works? And what exactly is an MOU?

I'm sorry but I can't share my WhatsApp number due to personal reasons. Is there any other way we could continue this conversation? Maybe through email or here itself?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Get Back To Me
body:
You keeping quiet is not good, always communicate because the arrangement
is the best and you will be so happy working with us. The best place in our
office is where you can come for the meeting and also go inside the bank.
The meeting will be held inside our office and also the signing of the loan
documentation. In the meeting we can also invest with you if your proposal
is good, if not we will give you a loan and you will go back to our country
the next day. Choose one of our offices in Madrid, Spain, Netherlands
(Amsterdam), Qatar (Doha), Indonesia (Jakarta), Dubai or Brazil but I
prefer Spain or Qatar because you will go inside the bank. Our bankers are
perfect because they will communicate with your bank to make things easy
for you so when the money comes in bit by bit, your bank will step it down
with no disturbance because our bank will contact your bank and no
authorities can question you. Why are you not taking calls from our
managing director? Are you free to talk on the phone today?Please can you
reconfirm your details, full address, valid identification (driver's
license or passport), name you wish to be on the MOU and the country of our
office you can travel to. I await your feedback.
Regards,
*CFO*

subject: Re: Get Back To Me
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's really exciting to hear about the opportunities your company offers. I'm particularly interested in the idea of a meeting inside your office, it sounds like a great way to get to know each other better.

I must apologize if I've missed any calls from your managing director. My schedule has been quite busy lately, but I'm definitely open to having a conversation over the phone.

As for choosing an office location, both Spain and Qatar sound wonderful! Could you tell me more about what I could expect from a visit to either of these locations? What are some of the highlights?

Regarding my personal details, I prefer not to share them over email for security reasons. However, we can certainly discuss further when we speak on the phone or meet in person.

Looking forward to hearing back from you!

Best wishes,
Steven
